title: Open ravioli with dillisk pasta, broad beans, asparagus and fennel in a lemon cream sauce
description: Layers of pasta laced with a wonderfully savoury seaweed, filled with broad beans, asparagus and fennel in a cream sauce all makes for something rather divine.Equipment and preparation: You will need a pasta machine, food processor and a mandolin.
ingredients: 2 tbsp very finely chopped dillisk (also known as dulse)
15 young asparagus spears, trimmed, sliced lengthways
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ fennel bulb, thinly sliced using a mandolin
1 tsp chopped golden marjoram leaves, plus extra to garnish
organic calendula and borage flowers, to garnish
ricotta salata (pressed, dried and salted ricotta), crumbled, to garnish
